oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Calf puller in my pocket: Rope, knots, mechanical advantage
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Videto, Judd
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: calf restraint
rope
knots
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Knots that are essential are available on You Tube or books. The most important are the bowline, truckers hitch, round turn reverse with 2 half hitches, double fisherman's knot, prusik, Valdotain Tresse, versa tackle, marline spike hitch.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2018; 260
